title: Looking for Girls to Play With
body:
**First of all I want to say i'm not a little kid looking for a girlfriend, i'm not a pervert nor a creep and I'm just looking for a girl to play with because i'm always playing with guys.
**
My skype is PlasmaPyro and LoL Name iNachozzHD

replies.body: Are you actually because all these other people are trolling..
From now on I shall call you Katie.
Hi im new gril liga leggings playa, i would lik to play with you
you don't find this at all weird ?
No, because I am sick of playing with guys, all my real life friends are guys, PSN friends guys and LoL friends are guys.
Its kind of sad knowing that people just tease people for asking a question nowadays.

Specifically asking for a kind of gender to befriend really does seem strange no matter how you look at it.

If someone comes up and say "Hey since all my friends are girls I wanna have some guys to play games with".

It really is kinda, eh ya know.

Looking for hot guy gramers to Play With

First of all I want to say i'm a little kid looking for a guyfriend, i'm a pervert or a creep and I'm just looking for a guy to play with because i'm always playing with girls. 
My skype is molendo and LoL Name is molendo
